about_the_game:
These monster assets have a charming, pop-art style that makes them easy to incorporate into your projects!

This set features a collection of ultra-compact monsters, all in 48x48 pixel size.

■ Includes a whopping 151 monsters, each in two color variations, plus a few bonus images!

■ The pixel art monster site [RPG Dot] also offers free monster images for download.

【Monster Assets】

151 monsters x 2 colors + 6 bonus monsters

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
